oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mode converter for broadband dispersion compensation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SURVAIYA, SP
SHEVGAONKAR, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bragg gratings
optical communication equipment
optical fibre communication
wavelength division multiplexing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have shown that the flatness of a wide band mode converter using tilted fiber Bragg grating can be optimized with fiber parameters namely the core radius. Insertion loss due to mode converter is also computed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the Pacific Rim Conference on Lasers and Electro-Optics (V 3), Seoul, South Korea, 30 August-3 September 1999, 595-596
